info.name: WhatsApp - Windows Live Messenger
info.additionalInfo:
/*------------------------------------- UPDATE 2018-06-27 --------------------------------*/
- Removed "Senders name added before message"
- Added "Balloons" again
A mix of WhatsApp and Windows Live Messenger looks better than before

/*------------------------------------------ 2018-06-26 ---------------------------------------*/
- Windows Live Messenger colors and logo
- Square images with green padding border (like "online contacts")
- Similar input
- Similar emoticon button
- "Ballons" removed
- Senders name added before message
